page.title: 10Dialect in the Exbourne area
page.content: Although there are many new families from elsewhere in the village of Exbourne,there are still several families who can trace back their ancestors locally. We hear them speak as follows:"Ers a gude lill maid-'erv aited up aul er dinner."She's a good little girl,she has eaten up all her dinner." "Us is gwain awm" "We are going home" "Don ee put thicky things in thur, ee'l get squarsht"."Don't put those things in there, they will get squashed." Old farmer about new fangled ways"Tis all mechanism,t'aint no natur,now." "It is all mechanized, there's nothing natural." That's what we think he meant!
